basic_information.scholarship_name: Micah Steelman Memorial Endowed Scholarship in Accounting

description: The Micah Steelman Memorial Endowed Scholarship in Accounting is open to students who have completed a minimum of 60 credit hours. Must be full-time with a minimum 2.75 cumulative GPA. Preference will be given to a student who has completed or is currently completing an accounting internship. Must provide a faculty recommendation. Eligibility Requirements Accounting major Minimum cumulative GPA of 2.75 or higher Completed at least 60 hours Must be enrolled full-time Must provide a faculty recommendation letter Selection Process Preference will be given to a student who has completed or is currently completing an accounting internship. (This scholarship is a Free course textbook package)

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Accounting   or SIS_Major is Accounting   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Accounting   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Accounting
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Accounting   or SIS_Major is Accounting   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Accounting   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Accounting

criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
